title: Chemically recycled commercial polyurethane (PUR) foam using 2-hydroxypropyl ricinoleate as a glycolysis reactant for flexibility-enhanced automotive applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29966-29978
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04972A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Vojtěch Jašek, Petr Montag, Přemysl Menčík, Radek Přikryl, Alena Kalendová, Silvestr Figalla
Chemical recycling is a material and energy-saving concept that solves the landfilling and incinerating of used materials. This article presents the polyurethane chemical recycling route, including a bio-based solvent.
